Guardian's Breath.name: Guardian's Breath
Guardian's Breath.fullText:
Dragon Guardian Attack 11Guardian's Breath

You harm your foes by breathing on them, forcing them to succumb to your power.

Encounter        Arcane, Implement
Standard Action      Close blast 3

Target: Each enemy in the blast

Attack: Charisma vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target is marked and has vulnerable 5 to your attacks. Until the mark ends, if the target makes an attack that does not include you as a target, it takes damage equal to 2d6 + your bonus from Draconic Power after the attack is resolved.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 44.
Guardian's Breath.flavor: You harm your foes by breathing on them, forcing them to succumb to your power.
Guardian's Breath.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target is marked and has vulnerable 5 to your attacks. Until the mark ends, if the target makes an attack that does not include you as a target, it takes damage equal to 2d6 + your bonus from Draconic Power after the attack is resolved.

Shield of Dragon Might.name: Shield of Dragon Might
Shield of Dragon Might.fullText:
Dragon Guardian Utility 12Shield of Dragon Might

You breathe out a shield of energy in response to an attack, and it continues to protect you.

Daily        Arcane
Immediate Interrupt      Personal

Trigger: You are hit by an attack

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses, and the resistance granted by your Dragon Soul also applies to another damage type of your choice (acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder).


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 44.
Shield of Dragon Might.flavor: You breathe out a shield of energy in response to an attack, and it continues to protect you.
Shield of Dragon Might.trigger: You are hit by an attack
Shield of Dragon Might.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses, and the resistance granted by your Dragon Soul also applies to another damage type of your choice (acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder).

Lasting Breath.name: Lasting Breath
Lasting Breath.fullText:
Dragon Guardian Attack 20Lasting Breath

You exhale a blast of powerful dragonfire that scours your foes and draws their attention to you.

Daily        Arcane, Implement ; Varies
Standard Action      Close blast 5

Target: Each enemy in the blast

Attack: Charisma vs. Fortitude

Hit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and ongoing damage equal to 10 + your Strength modifier, and the target is marked (save ends both). The damage and the ongoing damage are of the type associated with your Dragon Soul resistance.
Until the mark ends, if the target makes an attack that does not include you as a target, it takes damage equal to 5d6 + your bonus from Draconic Power after the attack is resolved.

Miss: Half damage.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 44.
Lasting Breath.flavor: You exhale a blast of powerful dragonfire that scours your foes and draws their attention to you.
Lasting Breath.onHit:

Until the mark ends, if the target makes an attack that does not include you as a target, it takes damage equal to 5d6 + your bonus from Draconic Power after the attack is resolved.
